original_text:
When you come to appear before me,
    who has asked this of you,
    this trampling of my courts?
korean_text: 너희가 내 앞에 보이러 오니 이것을 누가 너희에게 요구하였느냐 내 마당만 밟을 뿐이니라

sentences.original_text: When you come to appear before me
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 내 앞에 나타나려고 올 때에

sentences.original_text: who has asked this of you
